import axios from'axios';axios.interceptors.request.use(function(req){if(localStorage.getItem('token')){req.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'));}return req;});export var signUp=function signUp(data){return axios.post("/login/signup",data);};export var signIn=function signIn(data){return axios.post("/login",data);};//I'll just leave these API ENDPOINTS here since we are not using it and we are handling the api request inside the components
